text: sl -ayha alrswl- bani 'iisrayiyl almeandyn lk: kam aetynahm min ayat wadhat fi ktbhm thdyhm 'iilaa alhq, fakafaruu biha klha, waerdu enha, wharrafwha ean mwadeha. waman yubadil niemat allah -why dynh- wayukafir biha min baed merftha, waqiam alhujat ealayh bha, fa'iina allah taealaa shadid aleiqab lh
